name: Kodak Photo CD File
summary: A KODAK file is an image saved in the Kodak Picture CD (KODAK) format used in now-discontinued Kodak Photo CD systems. It stores high-quality scanned photographs commonly distributed via CDs in the 1990s and early 2000s to allow users to archive and view scanned images from film.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Adobe Photoshop with Kodak's File Format Plugin

macos.display_name: Adobe Photoshop with Kodak's File Format Plugin
